City Council
------------

***City Council***

Mayor- Billy Carlton  
Mayor Pro-Tem- Robert Lavy  
Alderwoman- Melissa Roberson  
Alderman- Mike Scott  
Alderman- Mark Hill

Elections are held in May of every year, unless candidates are unopposed and the election is cancelled.

The City Council meets the 2nd Monday of every month @ 7 p.m. at the City Hall Council Chambers, 101 N. Main, Henrietta, TX.

Visitors are always welcome. Visitors wanting to speak during the public comments section will be given an opportunity at the beginning of the meeting. You must sign in at the door in order to speak. Except as permitted by Council, an individuals comments should not exceed three (3) minutes and the Council will take comments under advisement. The Council will not tolerate any disruptions by members of the audience or they will be asked to be removed if necessary.
